website_summaries.verdict: The simple installation, the strong aluminum material, and the one-step release earn high marks for this versatile kick-down doorstop.
pros: The strong aluminum in this doorstop will stand up to the heaviest door without bending
Pre-marked guide holes match previous kick-down doorstop holes, so there's no need to make new holes
One-step latch prevents users from having to dirty the top of their shoe or pull up the doorstop by hand
Adjustable, grippy rubber tip for doors with gaps
cons: Some users report that the doorstop may come unattached with the included short screws, so securing the unit with longer screws requires an additional purchase

customer_reviews.title: No Shoe Damage. No foot pain.
customer_reviews.text: Pros and cons about this product. About me: Using this on the front door of our apartment that has a self-closing door. Using it while barefooted (no-shoe Korean household) and wearing shoes (if coming in from the outside). Pros: Smooth. Super smooth operation. Ease. Requires only a little force to push down. Quiet. I was curious if it would make a loud sound snapping up. It doesn’t. Great installation. A template was provided so you know just how high/low to place it on your door! Bonus. Love that the rubber foot can be lowered as it wears away from use. Extending the life of the foot and reducing waste. Cons: None yet. Will update if I encounter any.
customer_reviews.author: VeloCat

customer_reviews.title: Works for a Few Months Only.
customer_reviews.text: Beware! I ordered 3 of these over the last year. After I installed the first I was so happy with it I ordered 2 more for my other doors. I shouldn’t have. They worked great for a few months - now 2 of them will just slide with a door opening even though they are down in the locked position. I imagine the other one will do the same before long. Didn’t even last a year. They are apparently not well made and are “loosening” up I guess. I know they were installed correctly because they worked Great for a while. But this was a lot of money to spend on a very short life. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this... works perfectly. Her closet door would slowly close from the fact its over 60 years old and slanted. she would get annoyed to no end. i tried a rubber door stopper but it would just get lost. This was the ultimate solution. If I had one negative to say, its that when you step on the latch and it flips up, it comes up fast and bangs against the top part. i would've put a spring in there to slow it down. but i just added one of those sticky pad things used for furniture to dull the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: The worst product that I have ever bought on Amazon. Doesn't work at all and now I have 6 holes on my door trying to fix this stupid product. The rubber at the bottom does not grip the floor and does not hold the door. What a waste of my money, time, and energy.
customer_reviews.author: P.P.A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and works great
customer_reviews.text: This door stop works perfect and is very easy to use. What I like best though are the extra steps the manufacturer took to make installing this fool proof. The card in the package is used as a template for perfect placement. The holes in the pattern are even pre-cut so they pop out. I've installed two of these so far and didn't have to use the adjustment knob at all. I don't write a whole bunch of reviews, but the quality of this door stop just can't be beat. The first one I bought is well over a year old and still working perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ChuckM

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.  Just get it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for use on doors with auto closers on them. I am glad I did. These things work so well. I probably didn't need to, but I center-puched and pre-drilled the spots on the template using a bit about half the size of the self-tapping screws that were included and the door stops mounted perfectly. For the stop that works on carpet, I pushed the template a bit into the carpet to compensate for the compression of the carpet pile. If you are thinking about getting these, do yourself a favor and just buy them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dueck

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing it at a friend's house and ordered it immediately as I think this is a brilliant design. It was extremely easy to install since it came with a template. I am always paranoid about drilling holes, but I guess I did a great job. It holds our garage door very well and because of it, I don't have to keep holding the door while bringing things in anymore. I was reading other reviews and saw people were installing it for commercial purposes and it broke, which I think this product wasn't designed for that. Hence, I highly recommend anyone who's looking to buy this product to install for home use only.
customer_reviews.author: An Tran

customer_reviews.title: low-end hardware but ok for the price paid in 2017.
customer_reviews.text: The product is made of some kind of cast metal . The finish is a brass color but it is not made of brass. It came scratched in several places/ The adjustment wheel doesn't turn without extreme effort let alone provide for any adjustment. Bottom line, it will probably work for at least a while, but frankly it's low-end hardware in my opinion. Perhaps I should have had lower expectations at the price I paid, and been better off going to an actual neighborhood hardware store to put my hands on what I wanted to buy, first. updated 5/19/2017. It still works, so I raised it to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David Glaser

customer_reviews.title: Great little invention
customer_reviews.text: Great little invention, works great and keeps things much more sanitary than touching a door prop. And easier than keeping up with a wedge stop. But for interior hollow doors, I would change mounting design from triangular 3 screw mounting to rectangular 4 screw mounting. This way, you could atleast get 2 screws into the solid board running along the edge of the door, which would make me feel better in case someone tries to push door closed with door stop down and cracks the door.
customer_reviews.author: Drpepp

customer_reviews.title: Keeps door closed
customer_reviews.text: I know that this is supposedly used to keep a door open, but I needed it to make sure a door stayed closed. I have a set of double doors where one door does not always latch properly when closed. Since this door is seldom used, I decided that a door stop would be the easiest and cheapest solution for this problem and I was right. Installation was easy since the package comes with a template which made the job simple. The only problem I had installing the doorstop was finding the correct drill bit for the metal surface.
customer_reviews.author: Kittery

customer_reviews.title: Awesome doorstop
customer_reviews.text: Love this doorstop. It was very easy to use at first but because our kid likes to really "test" items, started getting stuck in the down position (our kid stepped on and held himself up on it). After fiddling with it a bit, we got it to work smoothly again. The only thing we had to get used to was pushing it down...you have to make sure you push it all the way down for it to stay down. Great buy overall. Will buy one for my mother for ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Doctormano

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME AND EASY!
customer_reviews.text: Thing thing is a total upgrade from our old door stop that was so used the rubber wore off the bottom. With this new doorstop, you just press on the lever with your foot to release the stop. The lever location does make it slightly difficult to put the stopper down but still doable. The screws it came with were short because I managed to rip them out of the door by accidentally kicking the stopper but they were easy to reinstall. Use longer screws for more durability
customer_reviews.author: _Phaedra_

customer_reviews.title: Works a treat.
customer_reviews.text: They say small things amuse small minds. I must have a very small mind as I have spent the day keeping myself amused by this wonderful door stop. My bathroom door has the other type and I could never get my foot behind to push it up. It meant I had to bend over everytime I wanted to close the bathroom door as the bending just became too much for this old lady!!!! A friend installed today and I have spent considerable time walking back and forth and pressing down on the lever. It holds my door securely and neatly. Now I am looking at other doors which will soon receive a beautiful and well-made stopper.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: We have had 5 door stoppers on this metal commercial door in our kitchen.... eventually they all wear out and then when you open the door the stopper just falls to the ground and holds the door open when you dont want it open... it is a major pain in the _____. So when I saw this door stop I was curious... it is FANTASTIC! It just works... the stopper stays up all the time unless you put it down with your foot. Then when you want to release the door stop you press the lever and it releases... Perfect...
customer_reviews.author: Doug McCoy

customer_reviews.title: No hands to use doorstop
customer_reviews.text: This replaces an old doorstop whose rubber foot had worn down and no longer held a door in place. I wasn't sure if all doorstops were the same height so I bought this one since the height was adjustable. However I didn't need to use the adjustments. The no-hands feature wasn't that important to me when I bought it but now that I've been using it, I find it extremely handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jong S. Rho

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found.
customer_reviews.text: I installed my first unit as a replacement for a broken unit. I liked it so well that I replaced all of my other door stops with this one. Comes with a cardboard template so that placement is exact. Lowers and retracts so easily I can do it bare footed. Snaps up, snaps down. Sure and secure. No pinch points. Worth the price. I do wish that it came in brass color.
customer_reviews.author: HuskyGuy

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: it's a door stopper and it stops the door. it does the job right so 5 stars for you my little friend. it was easy to install with my hubby's battery operated screw driver. Kids have been playing with it as if it's the world newest invention and seems to be holding up. love how you just need to push down on the top and the stopper pops up. i like it, i'm sure you shall too.
customer_reviews.author: Master P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this (used the little template that came in the packaging) and I love how the rubber stop sticks to the floor. I especially love how easy it is to tap the toe to disengage the stop and how it flips up. Low profile, clean in appearance and works perfectly! My only concern is how long the rubber stopper at the bottom will work - will update in here if/when that ever happens! If I don't post again, it's still going STRONG!
customer_reviews.author: S_2mar

customer_reviews.title: Best door stop EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent door stopper. No need to use your fingers to pull up the dirty stopper. My germophobe nurse wife loves it. Easy installation using provided template. No measuring or having to guess what height to mount it. Self tapping screw so there's no drilling pilot holes. It's a little expensive compared to some others but I think it's well worth it. I liked the first one so much that I bought a second one to put on my garage door. They seem sturdy enough during the first week of use but I will update the review if they fail anytime in the next few years. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Gayan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold a door closed that doesn’t latch correctly anymore. It does the job, took less than 5 minutes to install, and because of the “antique bronze” color it matches the existing hardware and is barely noticeable. The instructions say to use a drill, but I just screwed the nails right into the door using some force and that worked just fine. Was worried that it would be too heavy duty to casually close and open with a bare foot, but it’s easy.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella S.

customer_reviews.title: our janitorial staff (who are in and out of 4 different janitorial closets multiple times per day) ABSOLUTELY LOVE THESE.
customer_reviews.text: After I ordered these, our building maintenance man questioned whether they’re worth the cost, and offered to run to Home Depot and buy cheaper ones. They arrived, I told him to install a few and see how they work... A few weeks later, I asked him how they’re working. He said “OMG, our janitorial staff (who are in and out of 4 different janitorial closets multiple times per day) ABSOLUTELY LOVE THESE...!!!” Yea, they’re awesome and they’re absolutely worth the cost if you use the door(s) often.
customer_reviews.author: TravellingBuckeye

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my fence doors open
customer_reviews.text: I just installed these door stops for my two swinging fence doors. Will be nice when I'm taking my trash cans in/out, and should be helpful for the yard and pool guys. It took me less than 5 minutes to install each one, using a drill bit to make pilot holes and a Philips screwdriver bit to screw in. Since these are being used outdoors, I'm going to spray them with Rustoleum spray paint as recommended to prevent rust from the rain.
customer_reviews.author: JooJi

customer_reviews.title: Designed to be operated by foot. Breaks when operated by foot.
customer_reviews.text: The cheap pot metal isn't sturdy enough to be used as it was designed. These are only used a few times a week and I've had them for less than a year. I'm sure the rest will begin breaking, too, so I'm purchasing a different brand. The screws that came with the stops were too short too thin - the stops pulled out of the door almost immediately so I had to upgrade to some larger screws. They're easy to install but I wouldn't recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: relevantslim

customer_reviews.title: Not commercial grade
customer_reviews.text: I installed three of these and the one that was in use every day for about six months broke. The other two are close to one year old. (Still not a long time.) Commercial grade, I do not think so. The release lever, which you "step on" to raise the stop is very long and gets into traffic. I cut about an inch off, right at the narrow spot. They work just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G.

customer_reviews.title: Made well but does not work well
customer_reviews.text: The stop looks good and made of quality materials but did not hold the door open that well. The door would just slide even though I made adjustments. I was using on non slip tile so it could be it just does not work well on tile. If I had carpet or hardwoods it may have stayed in place better. I had to remove it and go with another brand which worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: I installed this and it works very smoothly. Does what it says. Self drilling screws included. I liked it so much I bought another one but under another name company chasing a 2 pack deal. They looked identical so I figured they were all the same. Nope. The other ones did not work. It was stiff and would not flip up. This brand worked flawlessly. Buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R

customer_reviews.title: Quick release worth it's weight in gold
customer_reviews.text: There's a little practice involved in the sweeping motion needed to flip this doorstop down, so I understand the complaints. However, for myself and my family members, it was mastered within a few days. The quick release more than makes up for any minor difficulty engaging the stop. We were so pleased we purchased another two to use on problem doors.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kearns

customer_reviews.title: It is an extremely well made door stop
customer_reviews.text: I installed a boat load of these at church. It is an extremely well made door stop. The soft rubber foot holds extremely well on every type of interior surface. Everyone at church really loved the easy operating mechanism, and also that the heavy doors no longer slid on the ceramic tile like the other door stops I replaced. I WOULD NOT USE THESE OVER CONCRETE WITH A ROUGH FINISH like you see on sidewalks. If your exterior doors do open over rough concrete like ours do, at church, use the other types of door stops that have a hard reinforced rubber foot.
customer_reviews.author: Forgivn

customer_reviews.title: Terrific, so far
customer_reviews.text: The door stop installed easily and works very well. We are using it on French doors to prop one door open slightly to allow our dogs access to the back yard. Our previous (cheaper) doorstop lasted less than a month with frequent use. We are hopeful that this one will continue to work well for a considerably longer time.
customer_reviews.author: litlover77

customer_reviews.title: Ended up buying 5 more!
customer_reviews.text: It holds open a heavy door. Sturdy construction. I purchased one and was so happy with it, I bought 3 more. After installing those I found more places I could use them. Ended up purchasing 6 total. Best thing since sliced bread. Open the door to the position you want it in when blocked, place the template on the ground and mark the holes. A small pilot hole will also make it easier to install the screws. So easy
customer_reviews.author: Friedeien

customer_reviews.title: Nice door stop.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best door stops I have purchased. I'm a contractor so I frequently install items like this one and it's very well designed. The foot is adjustable so if the rubber wears down over time you can lower the foot without having to reposition the door stop. The lever on top is well thought out so you can close the door just by pressing it with your foot. Finish of the product is nice and has not worn off.
customer_reviews.author: J. Novak

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic design. Easy template to install with. Less than 10 minutes to install.
customer_reviews.text: Good design. Great paper template where the entire height of the paper is the right height, no measurement needed. Only drawback is that the top screw hole is hard to access because the stopper arm obstructs it, not enough to take off a star but you’ll need to slant your screwdriver to reach the screw.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Briggin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to install. Very very happy with my purchase. It's used to keep a very stubborn door open. The door wants to forcefully close while it it open. This door stop holds it open and because it's easy to flip down and then put back up by foot, everyone loves it. Highly recommend. Will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Cortney S

customer_reviews.title: QUIT LOOKING - THIS IS THE BEST ONE
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before getting this. I didn't want to keep fooling with something so trivial. There are SO MANY. You think, well....it's a door stop. How much difference can there be? Hey, there can be A LOT of difference. THIS ACTUALLY WORKS AND DOES WHAT IT'S EXPECTED TO DO WITH NO PROBLEMS AND YOU DON'T HAVE TO BEND DOWN TO PULL IT BACK UP. I ordered a second one today. I have Prime, so there's free 2-day shipping. Hubs put a longer screw in the middle because it was a tad loose with the one that came with it. AWESOME
customer_reviews.author: NewLife4Me

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! No more bending over
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! No more bending over! These are especially nice for people who are handicapped or mobility impaired, as the door stop can easily be released with a walking cane. You don't want to chock the door to full open position though, as you need just a tiny bit of additional push to make releasing the stop effortless. I work in a public facility and we've installed these on all our public access doors.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Colquitt

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I think of this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why it took me so long to buy this for our door leading to garage. The door is a spring/self closing door, and has always been a hassle when bringing in groceries, etc from garage. Saw similar device on friends garage and like the movie Quest for Fire, I slapped my head and said DOH! Easy install, template provided, marked spots for holes, drilled small pilot hole and secured to door. Love the fact you can engage the door stop and disengage it with your foot and no need to bend over.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Nut

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Very strong door stopper as long as ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very strong door stopper as long as you screw it on the right height from the ground. It also adds more locking security. Also tried to screw it on without a drill since I didn't have one. You can still do this, however, it will be a lot easier with the drill. Overall though, it's still an easy installation :).
customer_reviews.author: Swrvl

customer_reviews.title: Spring loaded and quality
customer_reviews.text: I just put it in and it's working great so far. The previous one I had was friction based and it kept failing and wouldn't stay in the upright position. This one is spring loaded, so easily retracts and holds to the upright position. The quality was better than I expected. Hopefully this one will last much longer than the other kind.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: When you have a really old house in New England, a good quality doorstop is essential. The Temby design is a good choice. It installs easily, looks great, and is easy to adjust. I am probably being a bit tough, but I dinged it one star because it can be a bit tricky to get the stop into the down position. The automatic pop-up feature to raise the stop works well, but it can also get in the way when you want to lower the stop. Annoying a bit, but overall, the design is quite good. I purchased two more units based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mr J.

customer_reviews.title: what a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: i have had this product installed for about 4 months now and it has already started falling apart!! what a waste of money. The black rubber at the bottom came off and you can put it back in but it keeps popping off. A gold colored screw also fell out and I'm not even sure where that goes. so disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: AP81

customer_reviews.title: this thing is beyond sturdy and it is incredibly satisfying to step on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the most pleasantly Ive been surprised when buying some random from amazon, this little thing is slick and went on my door in about 2 minutes. Just buy it, you'll wonder why you never had one of these before! It looked a little junky from the pics, and honestly its not the highest quality item Ive ever had - the brass finish feels cheap and I would go with another finish in the future. However, this thing is beyond sturdy and it is incredibly satisfying to step on the little step to fling it up!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Buck

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install
customer_reviews.text: My principal and the P.E. coach installed this on my classroom door. They ended up having to use different screws than the ones that came with it, and as handy as they are, I don’t think it was easy to install it. Granted, the door had a metal kick plate that they had to drill through, but still, the screws that came with it were too short. Super easy to use and very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I got this for our door going into the garage, it was super easy to install. No hands needed to use it, just flip it down with your foot when needed and tap the paddle to flip it back up when you’re done. Makes bringing stuff in and out of the garage so much easier. Feels well made and sturdy. Just be sure to install at the correct height so it operates properly.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Door stop technology at its finest!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this for our door from the inside leading to a garage. Super easy to install - using the packaging as a guide for piloting holes is smart. Otherwise, I like the find adjustment knob as well, and as advertised... its super easy to operate with your foot without bending over. I guess I should mention this is being used on a wood floor - don't know how well this would work on carpet. I haven't really shopped for door stops... like ever... but I don't think I really need to search much further!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Conveneint
customer_reviews.text: I really like this door stop. From convenience it is definitely a 5 star but the first one I bought only lasted about a month as far as the automatic function that that is on a rental condo so I don't know what they did to break it. We are using it for the winter so I put a new one on and we will see if it lasts longer when being used properly. If it last a few months with no problem I will probably change my review to 5 since I can't blame a product for someone else doing something but I would still state that maybe for commercial or rental use the regular one might be better.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Sykes

customer_reviews.title: No more slamming doors!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, both for firedoors to use when bringing things into the house from the garage. Without it my kids like to slam the door and drive me bonkers. Easy to install in the wood firedoor. For the metal firedoor, needed to use a drill. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: sct

customer_reviews.title: Great Stop For Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This door stop was as good as advertised. At first I was skeptical buying this because of the square bottom. However, I read how it is adjustable so that eased my concern. My concern was that square bottoms are hard to replace. I really like this door stop because it was easy to put the screws into the original holes and the way the stand comes up. I just have to press down on the lever and then the stand comes up. It is easy to use and holds up very well. Overall, I really recommend this product to anyone who needs a door stop. I personally use this for the garage and it works out well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hsiao

customer_reviews.title: Kitten Tested, Owner Approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when we got a 3 month old kitten who promptly destroyed our rubber door stopper. Have had this for almost a year now and it works great and looks like new in spite of our kitty’s teething period. One star removed cuz the whole thing came out the 3rd time I stepped on it. I had to replace the screws that came with it for hollow door anchors and screws. Haven’t had it happen since.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: A very useful tool
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install, comes with a template to mark drill holes. Don't drill the hole all the way through the door, I didn't but thought it would be funny if someone did because it doesn't really warn about that. It holds the door firm, and releases when I want it to by stepping on in it. Wish, I had done this years ago, so long old 4x4 wood block door stop, or other heavy object to prop doors open.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Crites

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered this door stop. I have several doors in my office that needed door stops. Unfortunately in my first order I did not order enough and my wife purchased another brand for the doors that I missed. The other brand was not as good as this Tenby and did not have the instant release. My second order was to replace the inferior door stops that my wife bought (they were a real pain to pull up). Those inferior door stops are now in the trash and we have Tenby's throughout my office.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: So easy and practical
customer_reviews.text: Love this doorstop! Back door at the cottage would swing shut between trips unloading the car, plus breezes would close it. Doorstops were inconvenient and bulky. This door stop was very easy to install (less than 5 minutes) and works so well. Adjustable, although was perfect as is for me. So easy to unlatch the stop! Glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Love that little spring that pops it right up.
customer_reviews.text: I have a commercial building with metal doors that need to have a foot that will flop down and hold the door open at times. The flimsy flop-down door openers I have used in the past stop working properly after a year or two. I found this Tenby product with a spring. Just installed it. It works great. And the prognosis for it working properly for many years is good. Thank you Tenby for taking one of the frustrations out of my life....liked it so much I just bought another one for another door.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Bevins

customer_reviews.title: Do exactly what they are designed to do
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect and do exactly what I need. They work great on hardwood and laminate floors. The install was super easy and they really hold the doors in place. I am able to lower, lock, and lift the rests easily with my foot. Such a great product. I have been using them in 2 separate doors for 4 months now and still work great.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Rush

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and stops an eight foot solid core door.
customer_reviews.text: Use this to hold the door when bringing in packages from the garage. Holds the door with no problems and works perfect. On press with your foot to lock it down and another to release the door. Well made and and sturdy enough for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: CarlS0525

customer_reviews.title: but we are really happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long these will last (because they are new, not because of quality concerns), but we are really happy so far. Our old door stops kept falling down. These have been great. We don't have to use these often, but they are handy when we do. So getting ones that are spring loaded and stay up when we don't need them are key. We have been very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: WHAC

customer_reviews.title: Use longer screws than what is included
customer_reviews.text: This works really well to hold open our weighted garage door, but the screws it comes with were not long enough to fasten the stopper to the door. I used them, but the stopper fell off in a short period of time (less than 3 months) due to not having a deep enough anchor with the short screws. If you buy this, I recommend using slightly longer screws than what is included.
customer_reviews.author: Unnamed Entity

customer_reviews.title: it just works great. Packaging doubles as a template for how hight ...
customer_reviews.text: regular wedge door stopper wouldn't stop my garage entry door on the hard wood floors. But this thing does, it just works great. Packaging doubles as a template for how hight to mount off the floor. What a nice touch by the company. I really appreciated not having to figure out high to set it before I drilled into my new door. And can be adjusted more after the fact with dial. great!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Stops holding after a month or so
customer_reviews.text: The rubber at the bottom does not hold on wood floor. We purchased this 3 times, everytime it stops holding the door after a few months. We switched to a magnet that goes on the back of the door and baseboard. Works better than this kick stand.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This has got a nice design and elegant finish. The only reason for missing out 5 star is the ultra-tight sprint action. Sometimes when I miss to lock it with the foot, it springs and hits back with some sound. Could've been a little bit smoother. But, it's not a reason to dislike it. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ACV

customer_reviews.title: Anti Burglar
customer_reviews.text: It did what I wanted it to do which was slow a burglar down if I am in my bedroom sleeping. I wanted to slow a burglar down and force him to make a lot of noise trying to open the door. Short of making my bedroom a "saferoom" this item was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in SC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Does not do it's one duty
customer_reviews.text: I love the release lever design of this door stop. The quality of the mechanism is premium. The only stumble I have found is the rubber foot is too hard and won't catch on to the floor to stop a door. I will sadly have to find a replacement hopefully as good of quality as this one minus the flaw of the rubber foot.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Good Door Stop, Screws Too Short
customer_reviews.text: It works well enough but the screws supplied are very short and after just one day they pulled out when I was trying to put the stop down. I fixed the problem by going to the home improvement store and getting longer bolts that go all the way through the door with a washer and nut on the other side. Now it's solid and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Benozzo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is really well thought out. From how you use the doorstop, to how the easiest mounting template is included, to how well it looks and holds the door. The whole experience has been good. Totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: Teemaree

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: The metal finish is great, function is good, the stopper on the bottom is poor, slides on too many surfaces. We tried a few different door stops with commercial clients and if the floor surface is dirty, you may have some slip.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. I have bought three of these already
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I have bought three of these already. They are super easy to install. They have a template and you just mark it and screw it in with included self tapping screws. They hold the door very well and look good. No more bending over to hook a hinge or putting a heavy object in front of the door. They are also adjustable if you need to lower the rubber piece. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: YourGo

customer_reviews.title: Good door stop, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: An excellent retractable door stop, however the packaging is bad; within a few seconds of opening the package the screws dropped out or went flying and even after an extensive search with a flashlight, I could only find one screw! I used other screws to make up for the loss, but still, losing parts in the first few seconds of opening the package was bad!!
customer_reviews.author: Colin L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a doorstop with a lever that releases the stop. It's as simple as that. The product looks really clean and was really easy to install. It does take a bit of force to push the stopper down so it latches onto the ground but it's really no big issue. Overall looks great and is easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Overall solid product
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered only had 2 of the 3 screws, but it was easy to return and the replacement was fine. The lever to tap for a hands free close is amazing! I have two little kids and it’s safe to assume my hands are always full heading in or out, and this has been an excellent hands free solution! My only complaint is that we have found it difficult to easily put the foot down.
customer_reviews.author: socalkitt

customer_reviews.title: not for commercial use
customer_reviews.text: Was a nice doorstop. I tried to use it on a door at a school with over 650 students and had high hopes. Lots of door stops fail here and wanted to try some different types out. This one lasted 3 weeks before the pedal that releases the spring broke off. I still gave it 3 stars because I really like the foot and had it been used in a more residential setting I'm sure it would have lasted several years. Just not a commercial grade product. It is metal but the inner metal looks to be cheap pot metal
customer_reviews.author: Nick P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking with extra adjustment.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking door stop. The only issue was that it didn't hold well on my tile floor. The 6" foot stop that I used from Prime Line Products worked very well on tile. I don't know what the difference is between the 2 products. I do like the adjustment in the foot just in case you don't position it correctly on the door, you can adjust the length a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Goose

customer_reviews.title: This door stop is fantastic. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Every time I bring things home and wish to unload my car I "battle" my door from my garage into my house. This door stop is fantastic. Well made, well designed. I use it all the time when coming into the house through my garage (the door is a fire door, by the way, and is designed to automatically close). Yes - go ahead and get this one. You won't be disappointed. By the way, use the template. It's easy and accurate. Good purchase decision . . .
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Top 10 purchases on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I never knew I could be so excited about a door stop. This is so easy to control with your foot. Releases easily with a tap and goes down and stays in place. Everyone who tried it has been impressed. It’s one of my top favorite Amazon purchases and I purchase a lot on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This is how they are supposed to work (2017)  not so good (2019)
customer_reviews.text: (2017) Such a simple item, very well done. It was heavy, solid metal, couldn't break it with a hammer. (2019 Now I ordered a second one (for our new house) and this one weighs next-to-nothing. I think it is either brass plated pot metal or brass plated plastic. It would take 1/2 dozen if these to equal the weight of the earlier one and the surface finish looks like a cheap kid's toy relative to the older one. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Gruddy

customer_reviews.title: Did you stop to search on Amazon to see if there was something better? Well
customer_reviews.text: Did you want to buy a normal wedge door stop? Did you stop to search on Amazon to see if there was something better? Well, then you're in luck. This thing is awesome. Hands free operation and easy to put down/take up when needed. Installed within minutes and looks great. Fantastic product and I will probably be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, and the pivot pin has proper caps on each end.
customer_reviews.text: Durable, and the pivot pin has proper caps on each end, rather than just a simple pin that's been hammered on the ends. I expect this to last a lot longer than the $4.00 one I bought from home depot. Consider using bolts that go through the door (with the appropriate sealant if necessary) rather than just using wood screws: it'll last a lot longer and won't loosen as much with time/use.
customer_reviews.author: Sifo Dyas

customer_reviews.title: Pet owner loves these, easy and safer w my pet
customer_reviews.text: Love these; ordered more. Fast easy installation and easy operation. Better than plastic or rubber door stops that my dog likes to chew; safer to use these for me with a dog that likes to chew things. :) well worth the money to me.
customer_reviews.author: Customer buyer reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Liked the first one so much I bought two more
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to use than those wedge doorstops, and unlike those wedges, these never end up underfoot, tripping you. Packaged with an easy-to-use template for drilling the three mounting screw holes and all mounting hardware. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul_in_Germany

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Needed something to hold out garage door open while carrying groceries or other stuff into the house. We were using a large change jar as a door stop, but that was starting to scratch the floor. The step release on this is awesome and install was simple. The package includes a template for the screws that you just lean up against the door. Install took only a couple of minutes once I grabbed my drill and screwdriver. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great door stop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the door on my new house had spring hinges and the door would slam shut without holding it by hand, this stopper was easy to install and has worked flawlessly for 6 months now. It's a work of art.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Keilhofer

customer_reviews.title: Work as intended, however...
customer_reviews.text: These work as they're intended, however, you're going to want to get longer screws for installation because the ones that come with are extremely short and won't last long. Meaning it's going to come off the door with continued use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Ackley

customer_reviews.title: I works great. My wife and I like that we can ...
customer_reviews.text: The holes lined up exactly where my old standard door stopper was on my door. I used the screw from my old stopper just because they were longer. I installed the Easy-Step Door Stop in under one minute. I works great. My wife and I like that we can simply just kick the stopped down and then to release we just have to kick on the top release lever. The product looks really well made and functions perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Big Wave Dave

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this easy to use door stop. My pantry door has a spice rack hung on the inside of it - so it's heavy and is always shutting closed....with me standing inside of it or in the doorway - so irritating. So I bought this and it's SOOOO easy to use. I pop it down with my foot and pop it back up with my foot. So simple and so easy to use. My 4 year old can use it easily also.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Tenby door stop review
customer_reviews.text: The Rolls-Royce of stops! Rugged good looks, easy function, timeless beauty and never fails to stop the door! From the front door at church to the door at the john these are the answer!
customer_reviews.author: Kayaking Don

customer_reviews.title: Couple quirks, but still practical and useful
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of keeping the door open, and I love the hands free option. The only things I don't like about it is 1) you need to stomp on it with some force without hitting the release lever to get it to stay down or it'll bounce back up, and 2) if you are barefoot while disengaging the stop, it'll bounce up and give your foot a good whack. But I still would use this over a wedge!
customer_reviews.author: MJD

customer_reviews.title: GREAT door stop
customer_reviews.text: GREAT door stop. LOVE the way there's a little lever sticking up to pop it back up Easily. EASY to use. Works Great. Probably be buying another! THX
customer_reviews.author: Front Desk

customer_reviews.title: Clever template design!
customer_reviews.text: Very clever packaging. Besides being very secure but easy to open, it include a template for positioning the drill holes. The template is size just about right, so that if you stand it on the floor, the template holes will line up correctly on the door. Small height adjustment can be made with the rubber foot. Allow for no hand operation. Perfect to use when you get home with keys and grocer bags in both hands!
customer_reviews.author: D. Le

customer_reviews.title: ie=UTF8&psc=1 It was very pretty, but totally impractical compared to this lovely device
customer_reviews.text: This has changed my life. We had purchased this fancy looking door stop:  It was very pretty, but totally impractical compared to this lovely device. My 2 year old can do pop this down and up easily, and it doesn't snap back so hard that I worry about it hurting her foot. Fabulous, highly recommend. Installed in less than a minute. LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: PNW Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Novice notice
customer_reviews.text: Product is a well built door stop. Warnings to novice: 1. This product may not work outdoors where wind can move a partially open door completely open or closed. For this purpose buy product "door stopper-door holder". 2. Antique bronze is not oil rubbed bronze. One is yellow, the other dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: RKPSonoma

customer_reviews.title: Great door stop
customer_reviews.text: This came with a simple template that you set on the floor to properly align the door stop on the door. The foot is adjustable if needed. I like the spring action and foot release so I never have to bend down to set it or release it.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN

customer_reviews.title: This gizmo is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in great condition. Had it installed in 5 minutes - the included guide in the package really simplifies things. I did use longer screws I happened to have on hand, as the included ones didn't look very long-term to me. I bought one similar to this a couple of years ago, one without the spring release, and within weeks the cheap thing was annoyingly falling down on its own. I threw it out. Finding this one was lucky - it's EXACTLY what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: H. Cook

customer_reviews.title: IT CLOSES!!!....
customer_reviews.text: This is AWESOME. It does its job and does it very well. I have a JAM PAKED CLOSET (ladies you know how that can be) where the door just does not close and stay closed anymore. My husband installed I this door stop (VERY easy install) and my door closes again. WOW!!!!! (in amazement). Does not slide, stays in place and does not scratch or smear your hard wood floors. I will be ordering another and I HIGHLY recommend this product and the seller.....
customer_reviews.author: The Diva

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to release these, with the release lever, than the plain kind. The whole crew likes them. These are amazing. You do have to kick them down a little harder, they don't drop down, but it's worth it! And they grip the floor better, slip less than the ones they replaced. If your old ones were mounted the correct height, and have 3 screws, these go right in the same screw holes for replacement. The package has a template for mounting them right.
customer_reviews.author: M. Luce

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this door stop for our solid panel doors. It was easy to install and has no problem holding the door in place. The release is easy to operate with the wide design. I especially like the adjustable feature of the rubber foot which ensures years of service. I will be ordering several more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: keeps door open
customer_reviews.text: I bought this door stop to use on my closet door to hold it open while I use a hanging ironing board. it does exactly what I want it to do. stay open without moving while I iron. It is easy to step on to flip it back up- even barefooted. I was able to install quickly by myself with a electric screwdriver. Very please with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: the4taylors

customer_reviews.title: Very good door stop
customer_reviews.text: Great door stop. Only challenge to it is that sometimes when you are setting it, it comes back up. Once it is in place, it is fantastic and has a great release mechanism. Replaced an old one that uses friction to keep it up and it was failing. The quality is quite good with the new one and i expect it to last a while.
customer_reviews.author: G. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this, very poorly made & doesn't adjust anything like what's described!
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda Cataleta

customer_reviews.title: Used as a security device, read review for more information.
customer_reviews.text: We used this, not to hold a door open, but to reinforce door security. There are two doors that connect, they are kind of unstable where they meet in the middle. Using this, now it's difficult to push the door inwards from the outside. The rubber gripper on the foot of this 'stop' does indeed grip the tile floor. Will buy another, and then have one on each door. This comes with a template, so there is no uncertainty as to where to drill holes.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming

customer_reviews.title: The older I get the more convenience items come in handy and this is one of those items I'm glad I found
customer_reviews.text: We installed this on the door from the garage into the house.. so nice when carrying groceries and other items in to use your foot to drop it down and the door stays in place and when your done to use your foot to step on the lever and it pops back up. The older I get the more convenience items come in handy and this is one of those items I'm glad I found - good solid quality
customer_reviews.author: ccvine

customer_reviews.title: This is good quality. For those of you who are installing ...
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality. For those of you who are installing on a metal door, be sure you get as close to the edge of the door as possible. Inside steel doors is hollow with a wood frame (i would imagine 2x4 size but am not sure) I went in a little too far and one screw just spins and spins. Luckily I had the other two in wood and it is sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mr P Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Part of the door stop packaging is a template used to locate the correct height of the mounting holes above the floor. This makes the installation EASY! Door Stop works good too!
customer_reviews.author: Skip Mckelvey

product_meta.title: Tenby Easy-Step Door Stops, 4-Inch, Satin Nickel
product_meta.description:
Color:Satin NickelINNOVATIVE, EASY-TO-USE DESIGN: Say goodbye to old plain kickdown doorstop! JUST STEP ON IT FOR INSTANT RELEASE: Sturdy spring mechanism for easy release- No bending down, No manual lifting, No dirty shoes!

HEIGHT-ADJUSTABLE RUBBER TIP: No need to replace rubber tip.

MAXIMUM DURABILITY: Made from high-quality materials for long and stable use.

SOLID GRIP: Sticks to all surfaces- hardwoods, concrete, tile, carpets.

EASY INSTALLATION: Use enclosed guidance sheet for marking screw holes, MATCHING SCREW HOLES: Replace old models with ease.
feature_bullets: INNOVATIVE, EASY-TO-USE DESIGN: Say goodbye to old plain kickdown doorstop! JUST STEP ON IT FOR INSTANT RELEASE: Sturdy spring mechanism for easy release- No bending down, No manual lifting, No dirty shoes!
HEIGHT-ADJUSTABLE RUBBER TIP: No need to replace rubber tip.
MAXIMUM DURABILITY: Made from high-quality materials for long and stable use.
SOLID GRIP: Sticks to all surfaces- hardwoods, concrete, tile, carpets.
EASY INSTALLATION: Use enclosed guidance sheet for marking screw holes, MATCHING SCREW HOLES: Replace old models with ease.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,728 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
